page.title: 18SHOPPING IN EPPING
page.content: Epping is about to have its first {superstore.}Tesco's is opening in October 1985.It will be 18,000 square feet in size.There will be a bakery department but very little home and wear.Many shopkeepers fear{competition from a giant,but others think that it will attract people to the town.A survey conducted by class 5 ,Epping Junior School,showed that shoppers interviewed did not all live in Epping,but came here to shop.Many shops are coming and going.Old friends have gone.Will this stop? The best known old friend to go is Woolworths which closed in 1984 : many missed it.(It was a handy shop for bits and bobs.)There is a rumour that it is going to be re-developed into smaller units.In June 1985 an advertisement appeared in local papers for{200 staff for the new Tesco's.
